attributes.additional_details:
State owned-&-operated digital-archive addresses technology-upgrade [BetaMax, Super 8, photographs] affording current-&-future generations trace & view ancestors at work, play & study. User-funded & protected-by fingerprints 'priceless' archive for-the-most-part of-interest-to extended-families. Promoting broadband-access clearly CRITICAL to UK-Economy. Nice-to watch ancestors making-things, driving-buses...

Privacy-issues necessitate 'State' Control; potential-employers & government-bodies benefit-from on-line background-checks.

Private-sector will-pay; licence-agreement requires HM Government 'control'.
